text:
@JoeBiden Obama Care=worthless/people on it would still have to pay for everything themselves - coronavirus or not.
Trump did better: He's making sure no one has to pay for coronavirus care. I cancelled my Obama Care (worthless). I just got Cov19 test at no charge. #ThankYouPresidentTrump
